name: Data access not using connection pool
description: Remove instances where a function, method, procedure, stored procedure, sub-routine, etc. executes a data resource management action without using a connection pooling capability (the usage of a connection pooling capability is technology dependent; for example, connection pooling is disabled with the addition of 'Pooling=false' to the connection string with ADO.NET or the value of a 'com.sun.jndi.ldap.connect.pool' environment parameter in Java)
